channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13056] Refactor table.jsp code to remove repeated code and make it easier to add new checks
item.description:
While trying to fix HBASE-13001, I realized that there is lot of html code repetition in table.jsp which is making addition of new checks slightly difficult in the sense I will have to:
1. Add the check at multiple places in the code
Or
2. Repeat the html code again for the new check

So I am proposing to re-factor table.jsp code such that the common html header/body is loaded without any condition check and then we generate the condition specific html code

snapshot.jsp follows the same format as explained below:

Current implementation:

====================



if( x ) {



  title_x

  common_html_header

  common_html_body

  x_specific_html_body



} else {



  title_y

  common_html_header

  common_html_body

  y_specific_html_body



}



New Implementation:

==================

if( x ) {



  title_x



} else {



  title_y



}

common_html_header

common_html_body



if( x ) {



  x_specific_html_body



} else {



  y_specific_html_body



}
item.summary: Refactor table.jsp code to remove repeated code and make it easier to add new checks

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: re-factor to remove repetition of common html header + body code

This message is automatically generated.
Thanks for doing this. Did you forget to include a file Vikas Vishwakarma?
Shall we handle the issue in HBASE-13001 here and close that issue as a dup of this one?

Andrew Purtell I tried including the null check fix for HBASE-13001 in this patch, but this null check is missing at the top level in the lines given below and I will have to move around quiet a few lines of embedded java code to handle this properly. It is getting slightly confusing to handle both at the same time. Should it be ok to patch this in first and then handle the null check separately? if not, I will add both fixes in here and submit the patch after complete testing.

     String fqtn = request.getParameter("name"); 

     HTable table = (HTable) master.getConnection().getTable(fqtn)

Also I need some help on how to handle this:
Should I just print a message like "Table not found or Table not ready" message and then redirect to the master page ?
stack I have attached HBASE-13056.patch in the jira. Are you referring to the same file or something else. I will attach one more patch for 0.98 also. I think table.jsp has changed a bit in between.
patch with 0.98.10RC2 build
Also stack Andrew Purtell formatting is a bit iffy, if i fix it entire file will show as diff. Let me know if you want me to take that up in this patch. I will fix it for the whole file.

Also if you were referring to snapshot.jsp above, then these changes are not required for snapshot.jsp It already has the format suggested in New Implementation. I mentioned it as an example where we are already doing this vs table.jsp where it is doing full repetition.
Pushed to branch-1+ after trying it on master. The 0.98 patch does not apply. Want to update Vikas Vishwakarma? Thanks.
